trans-unit.source: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) format images.
[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] format bitmaps support frame level thumbnails and frame level metadata.
They do not support preview, global thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames.
Encoding does not work in partial trust.
See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.JpegBitmapEncoder"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped horizontally during encoding.
XAML Text Usage
The horizontal flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation.
`true` if the image is flipped horizontally during encoding; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped vertically during encoding.
The vertical flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation.
XAML Text Usage
`true` if the image is flipped vertically during encoding; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality level of the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.
XAML Text Usage
The quality level of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tla2sharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.
The value range is 1 (lowest quality) to 100 (highest quality) inclusive.
Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image is rotated.
Rotation is supported only in 90-degree increments.
The rotation represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation.
XAML Text Usage
The degree to which the image is rotated.
